title: HOW 2 COUNTER YASUO TOP
body:
TIRED OF YASUO KILL ALWAYS YOU? FEED THEN GET BLAME BY TEAM? WITH {{champion:89}}  TOP. YOU CAN CARRY ALL GAME!

RUSH {{item:3077}}-->{{item:3071}} OR {{item:3078}}  (IF SNOWBALLING BUT I GET ALMOST ALL THE TIME CAUSE ITS GOOD DAMAGE FOR Q AND W SHEEN PROC) AFTER CLEAVER/ TRIFORCE FINISH {{item:3748}}.  IF lOOSING LANE (YOU NOOB!!!!!!!) RUSH TANK ITEM AFTER CLEVER CAUSE YOU NEED THAT CDR GIRL

NOW YOU GO TANKY, ALL THE BASICS WORK DEPENDING ON THE COMP SO I WONT LIST (I RUSH {{item:3068}} PERSONALLY), IF YOU WANNA GO HAM GET ANOTHER AD ITEM  {{item:3153}} OR {{item:3022}} (FROZEN MALLET IS HILARIOUS) 

CONGRATS YOU ARE GODLIKE AND CARRY YOU KILL ADC EASILY AND ARE HARD TO BURST ENJOY SOLO CARRYING

(try leo top its good & fun trust me)

replies.body: Renekton gets 6 stacks of fervor off of empowered w with a 1.5 secound stun attached. He also has sustain and can easily out duel yas easily.

BUT HE SUCKS IN TEAM FIGHTS

{{champion:89}}  DONT

Or, horror of all horrors, ban him!!! 
*gasp!!*
Master Yi top shits on Yas top building the same exact items. qB^)
